The Leunig Fragments

Michael Leunig is best known for his whimsical cartoons that have appeared in newspapers over several decades. In this entertaining documentary, the man behind the pen talks candidly about his life and work.

Warumuk - in the dark night

A collaboration between Bangarra Dance Theatre and The Australian Ballet, Warumuk was commissioned to celebrate The Australian Ballet's 50th anniversary in 2012, and takes its inspiration from traditional Aboriginal stories. Music performed by Orchestra Victoria.

Link: https://iview.abc.net.au/show/warumuk-in-the-dark-night/video/ZW2301A001S00
